title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
ingredients: Salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: Boil spaghetti in salted water until al dente.
Fry bacon with garlic until crispy, then remove garlic.
Whisk eggs with parmesan and black pepper.
Drain pasta and quickly toss with bacon.
Remove from heat and stir in the egg mixture.
Serve with extra parmesan and freshly ground pepper.
